page.original:
TABLE.EXTERNAL_CALCS_GET() Syntax Calc_List as C = TABLE.EXTERNAL_CALCS_GET( Tablename as C [, Format as C ] ) ArgumentDescription TablenameThe name of a table. FormatA character, numeric, logical, or date data display format.
Description The TABLE.EXTERNAL_CALCS_GET() method returns a list of externally defined calculated fields for a table. Example table.external_calcs_get("invoice_header")
See Table Functions and Methods
